If you travel to Qingdao by train, the first landmark to visit is the #Qingdao Railway Station. Established in the early 20th century, the station incorporates both Chinese and Western cultural elements in architecture, offering a fresh visual experience.

The Tai’erzhuang Ancient Town is full of cultural heritage and is an excellent place for sketching. Sketching here allows you to experience its charming ancient culture and draw inspiration from its long and rich historical heritage. Would you like to come here and try sketching? 
Location: Zaozhuang, Shandong.
#FriendlyShandong #AmazingShandong #ShandongTips

result.text:
The Shan-Shaan Guild Hall in #Liaocheng is an important part of the canal culture and is the largest and best-preserved guild hall in China. It maintains historical records of the economic development of Liaocheng as a prosperous city in ancient times.

result.text:
On Nov. 1, Zhang Jun, China's permanent representative to the United Nations, introduced the "#Luban Lock" to the world and used it as a metaphor for peace. 
Originating from #Zaozhuang, #Shandong province, China, the #Luban Lock is a puzzle toy that is easy to take apart, but difficult to assemble. It is derived from the sunmao (mortise and tenon joints) structure in ancient Chinese architecture. As a traditional Chinese cultural heritage, it reflects the great wisdom of ancient Chinese craftsmen.
#friendlyshandong #remarkableshandong #shandongculture

result.text:
Nothing beats a roasted sweet potato from #Yantai, Shandong. They are so sweet and fluffy, thanks to the sunny and rainy weather. You’ll love the syrupy core and the melt-in-the-mouth sensation!
